page.title: 08Bolton Ln.1st Sch.Bradford
page.content: James Atkinson Jowett gave Â£100 to some people with which to build a school.It was called{St.James} {School}.It was finished in 1859.Before St.James Church was built church services were held there . The school has 2 computers.One is a BBC model B,the other a Pet computer.We have a Pace disc drive and a tape recorder.We have a colour television and a record player with quite a few records.The school has pets- a guinea pig,2 gerbils and some goldfish.At first there were 2 halls,outside toilets and caretaker's house.But now there are 4 classes,one in a terrapin,the others in the main building and a television room, library,kitchen and administration.
